title: Are Season 8 Placement Matches Available?
body: Some of my friends finished their placement matches after season 7 ended, but when I play ranked, it just continues with my season 7 rank, instead of placement matches. Why is this? Can I play placement matches for season 8 yet?

replies.body: The "[**2017 season draws to a close**](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2017-ranked-season-ends-november-7)" page mentioned the 2018 season would start on Jan 16th. That's when placements will start as well.

No. Nobody gets placement matches as we are currently in preseason. It's called preseason for a reason. They're ensuring they have time to make any adjustments as players make adjustments to their playstyles and learn the rune setups they'll need to play. If you follow any LCS you'll have a good idea when it'll ramp up again and you can begin placements. I'm sure Riot will announce the beginning before you can actually start placements again.

> [{quoted}](name=Kantala,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=pVcetlrE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-21T19:38:00.649+0000)
>
> No. Nobody gets placement matches as we are currently in preseason. It's called preseason for a reason. They're ensuring they have time to make any adjustments as players make adjustments to their playstyles and learn the rune setups they'll need to play. If you follow any LCS you'll have a good idea when it'll ramp up again and you can begin placements. I'm sure Riot will announce the beginning before you can actually start placements again.

Much appreciated!
